title: Barclays Computers (PVT) Ltd. - CD&DVD - CD-R PlexDisk 50Pack 52X/700MB (N/W)
specs: DescriptionPlexDisc recordable CD media is made in Taiwan for superior quality and performance. They are perfect for recording audio, data, games, and more. The PlexDisc recordable CD media is affordable and works in a wider array of duplication and recording devices compared to cheaper, less reliable media options. Plus the white inkjet printable surface works across all known optical disc inkjet printers providing a vibrant printed image that can cover the entire disc surface to the center hub. The colors are more colorful and the Black is more pronounced with the PlexDisc 52x 700MB White Inkjet Hub Printable CD-R media. FeaturesTypeCD-RCapacity700MBSpeed1x - 52xTop SurfaceWhite Inkjet PrintablePieces per Pack50DimensionD 5.5" x W 5.5" x H 3.75"
